entries.description: Enhance Export Section UI for better user experience.
Remove Unused Print Tab from Export Section.
Fixed incorrect total credits display in print preview.
Correct print styles to ensure proper scaling and visibility of timetable during printing.
Fix issue with embedded slot merging logic.
Resolve flickering issue when switching between multiple timetables.
Remove unnecessary edit button click for a cleaner interface.
Resolve issue where faculty were not being added correctly to timetables.
Fix Multiple Timetable
Temporarily disable multiple timetable feature due to critical bugs.
Fix Bulk Add Teachers Missing
Improved clash detection algorithm for better accuracy in identifying scheduling conflicts.
Fix Timetable import
Introducing FFCS Planner 2.0 - Multiple Timetables
Fix course not explanding when icon clicked.
Fix changelog button overflow.
Update Sort Order functionality improved for better user experience.
Default add purple color option added to the interface.
Toggle expandable on item click feature implemented for improved navigation.
Color Filter functionality enhanced for better visual organization.
Remove V1, V2 Slots - legacy slot versions deprecated and removed.
Improve Accessibility: Enhanced color contrast and navigation support.
Show Similar slots in yellow color for better visual identification.
Selected faculty will appear first in the faculty list for easier access.
Responsive Design.
Sort Slot filter list alphabetically.
Welcome to FFCS Planner - Your complete VIT timetable management solution!
Interactive timetable grid with visual course placement and real-time updates. Support for all VIT time slots including theory and lab sessions.
Add, edit, and organize courses with faculty preferences. Support for course codes, names, and multiple faculty options per course.
Comprehensive teacher management system with bulk import capabilities and automatic slot merging for ELA/ETH combinations.
Smart clash detection system that identifies scheduling conflicts between courses and provides detailed clash visualization.
Export your timetable as high-quality PDF or image files with customizable formatting and branding.
Beautiful, responsive interface with dark/light theme support, smooth animations, and mobile-friendly design.
Automatic credit calculation and tracking to help you meet academic requirements.
Powerful search and filter options to quickly find courses, faculty, and timetable slots.
Local storage support to save your timetable data across browser sessions.
